title: Crashing on Startup
body:
Hey all, 
On the first day of 7.12 I was playing  a game, and about 10 minutes in  my game crashed.
Ever since whenever I run the game. the launch screen loads and crashed or it just says " League of legends has stopped working" and doesn't even open.
Now I have restarted multiple times, reinstalled and checked firewall/ antivirus software.
Other games I play continue to work normally though. 

If anyone has any ideas I would really appreciate it


~Enlorand

replies.body: If this crash is not resulting in a bugsplash, then the error may be indicating a failure reaching the game server.  Checking your firewalls and anti virus is a great start, though there's more steps ahead.  i recommend also going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help remove anything blocking your network from getting to us.  You'll want to test this in a custom game though, to prevent any penalties.  I hope that helps!
